bioverse.truncnorm_hack module¶

This module reproduces scipy.stats.truncnorm as of SciPy v1.3.3. More recent versions of truncnorm are orders of magnitude slower as documented here and elsewhere: https://github.com/scipy/scipy/issues/12370.

class bioverse.truncnorm_hack.truncnorm_gen(momtype=1, a=None, b=None, xtol=1e-14, badvalue=None, name=None, longname=None, shapes=None, extradoc=None, seed=None)¶

Bases: scipy.stats._distn_infrastructure.rv_continuous
